title: Encore: 'Maushop And Grandfather Sun'
dc:creator: WBUR
description: Wes Studi, who later this month will become the first Native American actor to receive an Oscar, stars as the Wampanoag mythical figure 'Maushop,' a kind, gentle giant who tries to convince the sun to come back home.
itunes:author: WBUR
